text: The cell lysates were examined for CDK4 , CDK6 , cyclinD1 , CDK2 , cyclinE1 , CDK1 , cyclinB1 and histone with ELISA kits ( Meiyan , Shanghai , China ) according to the manufacturer ' s instructions . The microplate was quantified using a microplate reader ( Bio - Rad , Hercules , CA , USA ) . Target protein expression was normalized to the histone expression .
